  • Method Details

    • updateName

      public PlayerResponse updateName(PlayerDTO playerDTO)
      Method to update the player name.
      • This method is responsible for:
        • Check the player and his name is not empty or null.
        • Check the player name is not already in use or is the same as the current name.
        • Update the player name using the security context.
      Specified by:
      updateName in interface PlayerService
      Parameters:
      playerDTO - The player DTO.
      Returns:
      PlayerResponse The player response.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException - If the player name is empty, null, already exists or is the same as the current name.

    • deletePlayerHistory

      public PlayerResponse deletePlayerHistory()
      Method to delete the player history.
      • This method is responsible for:
        • Check the player id.
        • Search the player history by id.
        • Delete the player history.
        • Return the player response.
      Specified by:
      deletePlayerHistory in interface PlayerService
      Returns:
      PlayerResponse The player response.
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerException - If the player name is empty or null.

        • Return the player response.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
